rooms.name: Lobby and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area leading into a minimalist living space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade to maximize natural light, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: A compact open kitchen integrated with a dining area, designed in a minimalist style, featuring modern appliances and floor-to-ceiling windows for an airy feel.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located on the ground level with its own balcony offering panoramic views; floor-to-ceiling windows ensure plenty of natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines for calm energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with a small balcony overlooking the garden area; incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain minimalist aesthetic and align with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: A large front door designed for easy access and energy flow as per Vastu norms.

openings.name: Balcony Doorways
openings.description: Access points to the balconies of both bedrooms, ensuring connection with outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Pool Entrance
openings.description: Door leading from the ground floor to the swimming pool area, designed for easy access and safety.

auxiliary_spaces.name: Swimming Pool Area
auxiliary_spaces.description: A modern swimming pool integrated into the villa design, providing relaxation and aesthetic appeal. The pool area is designed with safety measures in accordance with local building codes.

auxiliary_spaces.name: Utility Room
auxiliary_spaces.description: Service space for laundry, storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance tools. Located strategically to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Studio Suite
rooms.description: A duplex studio designed for flexible use; serves as a guest suite or additional living space. Features floor-to-ceiling windows and an adjoining balcony to maximize natural light and adhere to minimalist aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet area for work and reading, with ample lighting provided by floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed in a minimalist style that complements the overall villa design.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access to the spacious balconies of the upper studio suite and study area, ensuring connection with outdoor spaces as per Vastu guidelines.
